document.full_text: the u.s. manufacturing and services sectors will continue to grow this year as revenues rise, but prices for materials are seen climbing further, according to an industry forecast released on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. factory, services revenue to rise in 2011: ism
lines_and_colors: the u.s. manufacturing and services sectors will continue to grow this year as revenues rise, but prices for materials are seen climbing further, according to an industry forecast released on tuesday.
